titleStmt.title: CLII lectures vpon Psalme LI preached at Ashby-Delazouch in Leicester-shire / by that late faithfull and worthy minister of Iesus Christ, Mr. Arthur Hildersam.
titleStmt.author: Hildersam, Arthur, 1563-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Miller for Edward Brewster at his shop at the great North doore of Pauls at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
